column5: The Master's degree in Cybersecurity focuses on the study of the design, development and evaluation of secure computer systems, also capable of ensuring privacy for future ICT systems. The programme is characterised by an interdisciplinary approach that collects contributions from computer science, engineering, statistics, legal-economic and organizational sciences, along with specific knowledge of the major application domains of cyberattack protection.
column7: Our tuition fees will not exceed 2700 euros per year. Scholarship and fee waivers are available for international students, for more information visit our website.
